tool.name: Change title

param.name: infile
param.label: Compound file
param.help: Specify a compound file in SDF or MOL2 format.

param.name: key
param.label: Compound identifier encoded in the SD-file.
param.help: Specify the key name of the SDF metadata which contains the molecule identifier (e.g. 'PUBCHEM_SHAPE_VOLUME')

param.name: random
param.label: Add a random suffix to the title
param.help: The title will be named like TITLE__xbrsjqssafh2t

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What this tool does**
Reassigns the title of a molecule file (SDF or MOL2) to a metadata value of a given ID in the same molecule file. For example, if the metadata identifier chosen is PUBCHEM_SHAPE_VOLUME, then the title of the file (in the first line) will be replaced by the variable listed under PUBCHEM_SHAPE_VOLUME.
-----
.. class:: infomark
**Input**
`SD-file`_ with metadata including the given ID.
.. _SD-file: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chemical_table_file
-----
.. class:: infomark
**Output**
Same as input, with changed title tag.
